definitions.description: A provision related to hazards, circumstances, or specific property not covered by the Insurance Policy (related to a Coverage).

constantValues: A provision related to hazards, circumstances, or specific property not covered by the Insurance Policy (related to a Coverage).

members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: statecode
